title: Trigger a new draft build after backend lowercase filter fix

requirements.summary: Trigger a new successful draft build so the updated backend filter behavior can be tested.
acceptanceCriteria: A new draft build completes successfully with the backend filter fix included.
After the build, generating a "Lower Body" workout returns a variety of leg exercises (not only Core exercises).

file_operations.description: Append a new dated retry entry (next attempt number) indicating this change is intended to trigger a fresh draft build for validating the backend filter fix, without changing runtime behavior or UI.
